lines.text: The words of a sadist, one of the most disruptive elements in human society. To have complete mastery over another, to make him a helpless object, to humiliate him, to enslave, to inflict moral insanity upon the innocent. That is his objective, and his twisted pleasure!
I have been hurt by others. And I will hurt them. I will make them suffer like I have suffered.
Who would believe in something like this?
